subject: feat(import): add pre-import validation gate with warnings
body:
Surface actionable feedback before merge review: unresolved arc endpoints
(connections referencing items not in the file), duplicate node titles,
and file size guard (10 MB limit). Warnings are non-blocking â€” users see
them in the JSON preview step but can still proceed to review.

Adds `warnings` field to ImportValidation interface. The buildImportWarnings
helper runs after title-based arc resolution to detect dangling connections
and duplicate titles. ImportModal shows warnings using the existing amber
warning styling pattern.

Tags: import, validation, ux, pre-import-gate
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: import-validation
Semver: minor

title: add pre-import validation gate with warnings
